name: Nautical Nonsense (Z73)
description:
Use your cunning and wits to survive the perils of this undersea world. Experience the wonder of the ocean’s deep, through various coral reefs and treacherous undersea biomes. Find upgrades for your submarine, and discover the truth behind the disappearance of your fellow submariners.

Message from the Captain. Blast these incompetent land lubbers, This rusty contraption was hastily built and poorly designed by a couple of sleep-deprived monkeys and was likely prematurely put into service. Captain Shame Forrus

ps. My ears are blocked, I can't hear a thing!

Game instructions

Find equipment to progress and explore further

- Shift = fast

- Q = drill
